title.rendered: Pel Air Airlines Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Pel-Air Aviation Pty Ltd (trading as Pel-Air) is an airline based in Mascot, Sydney, Australia. It is a wholly owned subsidiary of Regional Express Holdings, which also owns Australian airlines Regional Express Airlines (Rex).

Pel-Air specialises in air charter and ad hoc services, operating executive charter services throughout Australasia, as well as a freight service. It also operates medevac and government support services with its fleet of Westwind aircraft. Its main bases are Brisbane Airport , Adelaide Airport and Essendon Airport.

Verified & Updated on: 30/06/21

Pel Air Airline Address, Phone, Email, Working hours

Postal Address : PO Box 807 Mascot
New South Wales 1460
Australia

Phone :02 9667 7700

FAX:02 9667 7701

Email id: media@rex.com.au

Opening Hours: NA

Street Address

81-83 Baxter Road
Mascot
New South Wales 2020
Australia

Operations: 1800 676 838

Media: 0402 438 361

Pel Air Airline Official website: http://www.pelair.com.au/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Pel Air Airline

  • Hawker Beechcraft B200C King Air
  • IAI 1124 Westwind
  • IAI 1124A Westwind II
  • Saab 340AF

Pel Air Airline Baggage Allowance

Passengers travelling with Pel-Air are welcome to bring:

  • Carry-on Baggage
  • Checked Baggage Allowance

For further information on Baggage Policy, please contact Pel-Air directly at

Phone :1800 676 838

Email: pelairops@pelair.com.au.

Queries handled by Pel Air Airline Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Pel Air Airline  Office Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Pel Air Airline Office: (click on the stars below)
